<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/nhi/orphans/detect"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns active entities whose owner is missing, deleted, or inactive,
and that have no backup owner configured.

  parameters={undefined}
